name: Chaos Trametes
desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, increase the number of free Blessing resets by 1.
bg_desc: Clouds are born from a collection of moisture. They are created for no purpose, and dissipate without forewarning. However, when humans gaze upon the randomly created clouds, they often project their imagination onto these shapes. The Doctors of Chaos do not believe in absolute nihility. All that appears meaningless must have its own irrefutable purpose. Chaos Trametes is their most common Curio item, used to restore the confidence of despairing Self-Annihilators to have purpose in their lives again.
